project1.title: Dino Kennel
project1.description: This is a single-page application with dynamic features. Similar to Tamagotchi digital pets, the user can care for dinos in the kennel by feeding them, petting them, and sending them on adventures!
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Version Control with Github

project2.title: Pinterest
project2.description: The user can pin ideas from other websites and organize them into categories on boards, similar to the original Pinterest.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Version Control with Github

project3.title: Le Baguette
project3.description: This web application allows authorized users to use CRUD functionality to manage a restaurant's operations. This group project was completed during my program at Nashville Software School.
project3.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Version Control with Github
